author: sky.cactus
content: True, but you can use built in browser tools (edit and resend in network tab) to do it.  You can also use something like curl for one-off testing or data gathering.

author: tkstanczak
content: Please add any spec known to you here: https://github.com/ethereum-oasis/eth1.x-JSON-RPC-API-standard/issues/4

author: vorot93
content: With transcoder you still pay the price of having to manually implement JSONRPC server.

author: vorot93
content: The best route is to bury JSONRPC and write the API spec in gRPC protobuf
